DesignsSquare.com Portfolio Widget Documentation

Portfolio Functionality For Drupal

  • Last Updated: Jun 8, 2014
  • Developed By: DesignsSquare.com
  • Email: contact@designssquare.com
.

Thank you for purchasing our product. If you have any questions, please feel free to email us!

About

DesignsSquare.com.portfolio widget contains:

  • Portfolio Index: portfolio space for displaying all projects
  • Project Display: Display of the each project with set of image to better convey information about project
  • Portfolio Teaser: project thumbs embedded in slider for front page display easy to configure with views,blocks UI
  • Portfolio Block: displays project thumbs intended for regions such as sidebar, footer,etc. It is easy to configure with views, context and blocks UI
  • Sample Products for kick start

Installation

Here are steps to install the widget

  1. Enable module "DesignsSquare.com Portfolio Widget" that will also enable "DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio : Structure and Configurations" module
  2. Enable module "DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Sample Data - Kickstart" for Sample Products(recommended) to import block configurations, products attribute taxonomies, views among other things all related to sample data
  3. Revert Features - "DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio : Structure and Configurations","DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Sample Data - Kickstart" and Clear All Cache

Blocks

The Portfolio widget comes with the following blocks

DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Teaser This block displays projects thumbs in a row that slides and is fully functional slider intended for home page/landing page. It is configured via view - DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Teaser

DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Projects This block displays projects thumbs intended for Portfolio Index space to list all projects. It is configured via view - DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Projects

DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: BlockThis block displays projects thumbs linking to each project intended for regions such as sidebar, footer,etc. It is configured via view - DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Block

Fields

Project Display Fields

Here are recommended fields for project display to have complete functionality

Field NameMachine NameTypePurpose
Featured Imgfield_ds_portfolio_featured_imgImageimage used int the Project teaser
Summaryfield_ds_portfolio_summaryLong textshort intro about the project displayed in the Project teaser
Imagesfield_ds_portfolio_imagesImagesOther images to better represent project

Layouts(Content Types)

  • DS Portfolio: The layout for Portfolio Space that displays teaser of the each project
  • DS Portfolio Index: The layout for displaying projects

Views

In the following is overview of all views provided by the Portfolio widget:

ViewSpecificsPurpose
DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Projects
  • Format: HTML List OR Unformatted List
  • Fields: Content: Rendered Node
  • Use pager:Full | Paged, 0(or unlimited) items
  • Add Filter Criteria to filter per content type 'DS Portfolio'
  • Add tag 'designssquare_portfolio_products'
contains projects to display in the Portfolio space
DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Teaser
  • Format: HTML List OR Unformatted List
  • Fields: Content: Rendered Node
  • Use pager:Full | Paged, 0(or unlimited) items
  • Add Filter Criteria to filter per content type 'DS Portfolio'
  • Add tag 'designssquare_portfolio_teaser'
contains products to display in the store
DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Block
  • Format: HTML List OR Unformatted List
  • Fields: Content: Rendered Node
  • Use pager:Full | Paged, 0(or unlimited) items
  • Add Filter Criteria to filter per content type 'DS Portfolio'
  • Add tag 'designssquare_portfolio_block'
contains products to display in the store

How To

Portfolio

Portfolio Index is the portfolio space displaying teasers of pultiple projects. It is the front page of the portoflio. There is a sample portoflio index at url address - '/ds-portfolio'. This portfolio space finds the last node instance of 'Portfolio Index' and displays it. If you don't have Portfolio Index(space), you can create one by going 'admin/content/add" and select "DS Portfolio Index"' or import data by enabling module "DesignsSquae.com Portfolio Sample Data"

There is content type - "DS Portfolio" that you would use if you would like to create a portfolio space in your site. By default it is configured to have context - "portfolio_index"

After creating portfolio index, you need to tell what projects to include in your portfolio. To do so, go to the Context(admin/structure/context) and edit context 'portfolio_index'. Here, you assign the view containing the projects you like to be included to the region 'Content'. There is sample view DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Sample available for you to use and alter as you like. If you like to create your own view, then

  • it has to have a tag 'designssquare_portfolio_projects'
  • it has to reference a rendered instance of type 'DS Portfolio'

Portfolio Display

Portfolio Display displays the info about project including little description and number of images

Portfolio Teaser

Portfolio teaser is a block that can be assigned to any region via Block/Context UI. This block is a slider with project thumbs intended for landing page/ home page. The view - DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Block is used for configuring title, projects to include in the teaser

Portfolio Block

Portfolio Block is a block that can be assigned to any region via Block/Contect UI. It is itnended for regions sidebar, footer, etc. The view - DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: Block is used to configure title as well the projects to include

Template API

There is common representation API so the layouts(template files) can be swapped out and changed
Content TypeAPIMethods Implementing APIScope

$project_tapi['title']::[STRING];

$project_tapi['ds_contextual_links']::[RENDERABLE_ARRAY]
] 		_project_teaser_tapi($node) portfolio-project-teaser.tpl.php

$project_tapi['index']['next']['text']::[STRING];
$project_tapi['index']['previous']::[ARRAY];
$project_tapi['index']['previous']['text']::[STRING];
$project_tapi['index']['previous']['url']::[STRING];
$project_tapi['featured_img']::[ARRAY];
$project_tapi['featured_img']['url']::[STRING];
$project_tapi['featured_img']['alt']::[STRING];
$project_tapi['project_img']::[ARRAY];
$project_tapi['project_img']['N']::[ARRAY];

$project_tapi['project_img']['N']['alt']::[STRING];

Artifacts

Here are summary of all artifacts part of the Portfolio widget:

ItemContent TypeContextTemplatesViewsComments
Portfolio SpaceDS Portfolio Indexportoflio_indexpage--ds-portfolio.tpl.phpnonethis the layout of the portfolio space. To tell what projects to display in your porfolio, the view contain projects has to be assigned in the context 'profolio_index'
Project DisplayDS Portfolioanypage--ds-portfolio--project.tpl.phpn/athis is where the project is being displayed. One project display has a featured image with multiple other images
Portfolio Teasern/aanyviews-view-portfolio-projects.tpl.php, views-view-list--project-teaser.tpl.php, portfolio-project-teaser.tpl.phpDesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: TeaserThe tag - designssquare_portfolio_teaser kicks in the mechanism for slider teaser and appropriate template. This is good for featuring projects of the portfolio in home pages or landing page
Portfolio Index Teasern/aanyviews-view-portfolio-projects.tpl.php, views-view-list--project-teaser.tpl.php, portfolio-project-index-teaser.tpl.phpDesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: TeaserThe tag - designssquare_portfolio_teaser kicks in the mechanism for slider teaser and appropriate template. This is good for featuring projects of the portfolio in Portfolio Index pages
Portfolio Blockn/aanyviews-view-portfolio-block.tpl.php, views-view-list--project-block.tpl.php, DesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: BlockThe tag - designssquare_portfolio_block kicks in the mechanism for appropriate templates. This is good for assigning to regions such as sidebar, footer, etc
Portfolio Projectsn/aanyviews-view-portfolio-projects.tpl.php, views-view-list--project-portfolio.tpl.php, portfolio-project-teaser.tpl.phpDesignsSquare.com: Portfolio: ProjectsThe tag - designssquare_portfolio_projects kicks in the mechanism for appropriate templates. This is good for Portfolio space to show all projects in portfolio

Drupal Module Dependencies

In the following are direct dependencies for the Portfolio widget:
  • Portfolio: ? utilizes Drupal Portfolio funcionality
  • Portfolio_features for sample product import/export

Troubleshooting

0. Unable to generate the derived image located at public://... or ... Warning: filesize(): stat failed for

This happens when importing products on Drupal instance running on server without library - libjpeg installed/configured. Solution compile the PHP with libjpeg library or just copy artifacts manually

Things For Future Release

Here is list of features and enhancements that will be included in future releases:

  • Add tags and category functionality
  • Add flex slider to scroll images in the portfolio template
  • Fix image switcher on click to display in portfolio template
  • It takes times to load teaser, so lets add progress bar or something to demonstrate loading process
